p: Chengdu is an area with predominance of CRF01_AE and CRF08_BC, indicating distinct heterogeneity compared to what has been shown in other regions [ 18, 19]. For instance, about half of the subtypes were identified as CRF08_BC (47.4%) among the recently infected population in Yunnan [ 20] and CRF07_BC was the predominant strain in Xinjiang Province [ 21]. However, CRF01_AE was dominant in east China [ 22, 23]. It has been confirmed that one of the drug-trafficking routes in mainland China is from Yunnan to Sichuan and then to Xinjiang [ 24]. Hence, it is assumed that subtype profile in Chengdu is similar to Yunnan and Xinjiang provinces.
